results.title: Birthday boy
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Andrew Gregory and Sejong Park
results.brief_description: Korea 1951 - little Manuk is playing on the streets of his village and dreaming of life at the front where his father is a soldier. He returns home to find a parcel on the doorstep and, thinking it is a birthday present, he opens it. But its contents will change his life.
results.description: Korea 1951 - little Manuk is playing on the streets of his village and dreaming of life at the front where his father is a soldier. He returns home to find a parcel on the doorstep and, thinking it is a birthday present, he opens it. But its contents will change his life.

results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Tim Kreibig and Anna Fraser

results.title: Placement
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Sarah Warner and Bill Chen
results.brief_description:
Sometime in the future, Max lives with his only daughter, Ruby, in an apartment complex where he spends all his time working. But his life is shattered when Ruby chases her balloon off the edge and falls to the street below.
He is offered the chance to clone her and puts his strong religious beliefs aside in order to have his daughter back, but the new Ruby is not the same.

results.title: Pending
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Paola Garofali and Anna Tow
results.brief_description: In this fantasy animation, Jasmine flees her war-torn country for the safety of the towering City of Anchors. But between her traumatic past and her hopes for a new life, Jasmine must first face a heartless Immigration Department bureaucrat and persuade him to let her stay. Original Format 35 mm/colour.

results.title: The Other son
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Rachel Roberts and Heng Tang
results.brief_description: Vera is the meticulous wife, mother and reigning matriarch of her palatial home. She manages her domestic domain with digital clockwork precision. It is 7pm and dinner time. Her dutiful husband and beautiful son take their designated places at the table. However, the tranquillity is interrupted by the sudden appearance of an intruder threatening to shatter Vera’s utopia. Original format 35mm/colour.

Original format 35mm/colour.

results.title: Mozzie
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Jane Keneally and Dylan Yeo
results.brief_description: Spectacular animation about fluorocarbons, global warming and radical brain surgery. An evil entrepreneur discovers the real price of his actions. Combined live action and computer animation. Written, directed and animated by Dylan Yeo. Original format 35mm/colour.
